title: Lesson 67
paragraph: Conduct and behavior shape interactions. Proper actions, certification, and comparison ensure responsibility and efficiency.

words.meaning: to act in a particular way
words.example: Students should behave politely in class.
The former president attended the meeting.

words.meaning: able to be grouped or clustered
words.example: The data is clusterizeable for analysis.

words.meaning: to cause to go to a destination
words.example: He will send the package tomorrow.
The agency certified the product as safe.

words.meaning: a part of a larger whole
words.example: Each component is essential for the machine to function.
He prepped for the presentation carefully.

words.meaning: to come near or to methodically deal with
words.example: They approached the problem with care.
